Work and Experience

Software Development Intern

I interned at Fastenal. It's an B2B company based out of US. During my time, I successfully did the following project.

  1. Auto Mail Generator for SQL Queries - A web app built to automatically send emails based on SQL Query Execution. Reduced human effort by 30%

Research Intern - CDSAML

Center for Data Science and Applied Machine Learning

I'm interning at CDSAML Lab in our college (PES University). I worked on

  1. Text to Image Syntheis in Fashion - A research project with a web interface for converting attire description to image

The project details can be found here

Research Intern - NeuroEconomics

I'm interning under Dr. Marieke Van Vugt. She is an Assitant Professor at University of Groningen. Her main interests are in cognitive modelling. The work under her is still going on.

  1. Proof for Evidence Accumulation via EEG Analysis - The work is to find out how th evidence accumulation happens in human brain via the analysis of human brain.

As of now the project details are confidential

Operations Intern

I interned at Discount Shop. It's an e-commerce company based out of US. During my time, I successfully did the following projects.

  1. Watch Query - A web app built to scrape javascript heavy websites & query the scraped data. Reduced human effort by 30%
  2. Price Calc - A standalone cross platform application written in ElectronJS for complex calculation of prices of different products with built in excel functionality.
